creditline: Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
description:
two female friends seated and dressed in loose 'grand Dakar' dresses, one in a flower print and the other with large white spots within banding
Two friends dressed in loose "grand Dakar" dresses, one in a flower print, and the other with large white spots known as "petites pièces d'un franc" (tama-tama ni).
title: Untitled (two female friends seated)
